officialTitle: A Study to Assess the Anamnestic Immune Response 4 to 8 Years After a Primary Vaccination Series With HBVAXPRO

interventions.name: Comparator: Modified Process Hepatitis B Vaccine

arms.label: 5 µg Modified Process Hepatitis B Vaccine Booster (Group 1)
5 µg Modified Process Hepatitis B Vaccine Booster (Group 3)
5 µg Modified Process Hepatitis B Vaccine (Group 5)

summary: To assess the safety and immunogenicity of a booster dose of hepatitis B vaccine in children who have received a 3-dose primary series of either RECOMBIVAX HB or ENGERIX-B. The primary vaccination series (was given 4 to 8 years prior to study entry and consisted of a licensed hepatitis B vaccine product (either RECOMBIVAX HB or ENGERIX-B). The booster dose given in this study will be either an investigational Merck product (Modified Process Hepatitis B Vaccine) or licensed ENGERIX-B vaccine.

primaryOutcome.measure: Antibody Response to Hepatitis B Surface Antigen in Subjects Who Received a 3-dose Primary Series of RECOMBIVAX HB in Infancy
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 4 weeks after vaccination with either modified process hepatitis B vaccine or ENGERIX-B

effectByArm.arm: Modified Process Hepatitis B Vaccine Booster (Group 1)

commonTop: Pain, Injection site for hepatitis B vaccine
Swelling, Injection site for hepatitis B vaccine
Erythema, Injection site for hepatitis B vaccine
